body_html:
Yes, I've got my project building with bazel and tensorflow is set up as a local_repository.

It seems the linking was taking a long time due to something about using the clang from Xcode 7.3 (which I need to use because of CUDA), and seems to have been fixed by passing compiler flag -fvisibility-inlines-hidden.

body:
Yes, I've got my project building with bazel and tensorflow is set up as a local_repository. 

It seems the linking was taking a long time due to something about using the clang from Xcode 7.3 (which I need to use because of CUDA), and seems to have been fixed by passing compiler flag -fvisibility-inlines-hidden.
